data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Recoder, Renato Sousa, Junior, Mauro Teixeira, Cassimiro, José, Camacho, Agustín, Rodrigues, Miguel Trefaut (2010): A new species of Dendrophryniscus (Amphibia, Anura, Bufonidae) from the Atlantic Rainforest of southern Bahia, Brazil. Zootaxa 2642: 36-44, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.198625
